Text:
So you just need to add a join from User to Group to Roles, where role=the role you're looking for.  It's just a straight forward query with a join.

EDIT:  Something like this: https://gist.github.com/Tocacar/6061566

So you just need to add a join from User to Group to Roles, where role=the role you're looking for.  It's just a straight forward query with a join.

Something like this: 

    $qb->select("u")
            ->from("YourUserBundle:User", "u")
            ->join("u.Group", "g")
            ->join("g.Role", "r")
            ->where("r.role = :role");
        $query = $qb->getQuery();
        $query->setParameter("role", $role);
 
        $results = $query->getResult();

[View the gist](https://gist.github.com/Tocacar/6061566)
Comment: included the code from the gist
